thread.title: BRIEF-MedEquities Realty Trust Reports Q4 FFO Per Share Of $0.32

title: BRIEF-MedEquities Realty Trust Reports Q4 FFO Per Share Of $0.32
text: 36 AM / Updated 19 minutes ago BRIEF-MedEquities Realty Trust Reports Q4 FFO Per Share Of $0.32 Reuters Staff Feb 21 (Reuters) - Medequities Realty Trust Inc: * MEDEQUITIES REALTY TRUST REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER 2017 RESULTS * Q4 ADJUSTED FFO PER SHARE $0.31 * Q4 FFO PER SHARE $0.32 * Q4 REVENUE $16.2 MILLION VERSUS $14 MILLION * SEES FY 2018 ADJUSTED FFO PER SHARE $1.18 TO $1.22 * SEES FY 2018 FFO PER SHARE $1.17 TO $1.21 * Q4 FFO PER SHARE VIEW $0.31 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * FY2018 FFO PER SHARE VIEW $1.24 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
